EmailTemplate.subject: Download the SpringOne Platform Mobile App Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/agenda?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to welcoming you to SpringOne Platform 2017! <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-MobileApp-q417]]> Please take a few moments to read through the directions to activate your SpringOne Platform mobile app.
The Agenda & Mobile App Create and build your custom event schedule using your registration email address and the password:springforward. With this app you can view an interactive map, receive up to date conference information and view the conference agenda including session room assignments <[[https://springoneplatform.io/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-MobileApp-q417]]>.
Build Your Personal Schedule From the conference agenda, open a session and tap “Add -> My Schedule.” Then view your personal schedule anytime on the SpringOne Platform mobile app. Please note that all sessions are first come, first serve regardless of pre-event selection; you aren’t making a seat reservation, just building your personal schedule.
Download the mobile app from iTunes <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/springone-platform/id1308326191?mt=8]]> or Google Play <[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tapcrowd.pivotal6713]]> (or just search for “SpringOne Platform 2017”).
<[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/springone-platform/id1308326191?mt=8]]>
<[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tapcrowd.pivotal6713]]>
Social Media Follow all events in real-time by using the hashtag #springone <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]> and following @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]>.
Conference Contact Information Please contact SpringOne Platform Registration Headquarters.
Email: platform@pivotal.io <[[Mailto:http://info.pivotal.io/dC0N0lPA700J000U0D020I0]]> Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30am – 5:00pm
Thank you and we look forward to seeing you at the event! The SpringOne Platform Team
